description: Real dairy ice cream delivered to your door.  We deliver daily (Mon-Fri) to Deal and all areas within 10 miles of CT14 8JL. Minimum order is just 2 x 750ml with free delivery. An up to date list of flavours can be found on our website along with all details of how to order via email only.
name: Solley's Ice Cream
address: The Dairy, Church Road, Ripple, CT14 8JL
safetyTips: Contactless online payment by card only. "Knock" & drop delivery
